name: Panic's Underworld
description:
As a minion of the god of the Underworld, Panic's life is not easy. Even more so when he has to prepare the reception for Persephone as she comes to pass the Winter with Hades, as beware of a dark creature about to cause trouble in the Underworld. Follow Panic in these 12 levels in the Underworld and unlock all of the achievements.

This game was developed by me, Mitacla, for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 Game Jam. I really like it so, maybe, I will continue to develop it more in the near future.

Also thanks to Aldin Zorlak who created the background theme. Follow him on twitter @kozmikstudio.

And if you want to continue with Panic's adventure, comment below. Happy games.
